channel.title: Rsps problems [Help me plz]
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm playing for a long time a good rsps, but yesterday I got a clost at Ape Atoll. Many other players got that clost too, since then I haven't acces too my account. The moderators kicked my a several times because at login it says: "You're already logged in. Try again in 5 minutes." But it won't help. I can make an another account and log in on that, but not at my main account. The second thing it says at logIn: "Error connecting to server. Please reload client and try again." I have done it several times, and I have deleted the cache many times, but nothing helps. Can anybody help me? :confused:
Thx, Mark :D

item.title: Rsps problems [Help me plz]
item.dc:creator: @montrealboi montrealboi
item.description:
@montrealboi wrote:

This happened to me before, Go into your source files and check if you banned or not. if so remove your name and you should be able to log in

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps problems [Help me plz]
